question: what is the location of the VIC-II control register to unexpand a sprite in the horizontal direction
What is the operation to unexpand a sprite in the horizontal direction
To unexpand a sprite in the horizontal direction, the corresponding bit in the VIC-II control register at location 53277 ($D01D in HEX) must be turned OFF (set to a 0).
What is the range of sprite numbers for unexpanding a sprite in the horizontal direction
To unexpand a sprite in the horizontal direction, the corresponding bit in the VIC-II control register at location 53277 ($D01D in HEX) must be turned OFF (set to a 0).
